title: Customer Satisfaction and Product Usage Study
description: TechCorp Industries is launching a new cloud-based project management platform and needs to understand current customer satisfaction with existing tools, identify unmet needs, and validate key features of our new platform before full market launch. We need both quantitative metrics and qualitative insights to inform our product roadmap and marketing strategy.
objectives: Measure overall satisfaction with current project management tools among target audience
Identify top pain points and unmet needs in current solutions
Validate interest in and perceived value of our new platform's key features
Understand decision-making process and criteria for tool selection
Size the market opportunity and identify priority segments

requirements.target_audience: Project managers and team leads at companies with 50-500 employees, currently using project management software
requirements.geographic_scope: United States, United Kingdom, and Germany
requirements.timing_constraints: Field work must be completed before Q4 2024 product launch
compliance_requirements: Data security standards for B2B research
deliverable_requirements: Executive summary with key findings and recommendations
Detailed topline report with statistical significance testing

timeline: 12 weeks from kickoff to final presentation
target_audience: Project managers and team leads at mid-market companies (50-500 employees)
methodology_preferences: potentially focus groups for feature validation
